author: PTI
title: Indians in Wuhan say strict lockdown, social distancing only ways to contain COVID-19
description: A few daring Indians, who remained in Wuhan where the novel coronavirus first emerged and then became a global pandemic, have a word of advice for their compatriots back home: follow the strict lockdown and self-isolation measures to arrest the spread of the …
